00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <map>
00009 #include <memory>
00010 #include <functional>
00011 #include "lsf/basic/noncopyable.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/asio/socket.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace asio {
00017 namespace async {
00018 
00020 // Completion Queue
00022 class CompletionQueue : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable, public lsf::basic::Error {
00023 public:
00024     static const short ACTION_ACCEPT          = 1;
00025     static const short ACTION_CONNECT         = 2;
00026     static const short ACTION_WRITE           = 4;
00027     static const short ACTION_READ            = 5;
00028     static const short ACTION_TIMER           = 7;
00029     using accept_func_type          = std::function<void(SharedSocket, SharedSocket)>;
00030     using accept_fail_func_type     = std::function<void(SharedSocket)>;
00031     using connect_func_type         = std::function<void(SharedSocket, SockAddr const&)>;
00032     using connect_fail_func_type    = std::function<void(SharedSocket, SockAddr const&)>;
00033     using write_func_type           = std::function<void(SharedSocket, std::string const&)>;
00034     using read_func_type            = std::function<void(SharedSocket, std::string const&)>;
00035     using read_peer_close_func_type = std::function<void(SharedSocket)>;
00036     using timer_func_type           = std::function<void(int)>;
00037     using raw_func_type             = std::function<void(int, int)>;
00038 
00039     struct ReadCompletionFunc {
00040         accept_func_type          accept_func;
00041         accept_fail_func_type     accept_fail_func;
00042         read_func_type            read_func;
00043         read_peer_close_func_type read_peer_close_func;
00044         timer_func_type           timer_func;
00045         SharedSocket              shared_socket;
00046         short  action      = 0;
00047         int    timer_fd    = -1;
00048         size_t timer_count = 0;
00049     };
00050     struct WriteCompletionFunc {
00051         connect_func_type      connect_func;
00052         connect_fail_func_type connect_fail_func;
00053         write_func_type        write_func;
00054         SharedSocket           shared_socket;
00055         SockAddr               sockaddr;
00056         std::string buffer;
00057         short action = 0;
00058     };
00059     struct RawCompletionFunc {
00060         raw_func_type raw_func;
00061     };
00062 
00063     using shared_read_completion_type = std::shared_ptr<ReadCompletionFunc>;
00064     using shared_write_completion_type = std::shared_ptr<WriteCompletionFunc>;
00065     using shared_raw_completion_type = std::shared_ptr<RawCompletionFunc>;
00066 
00067 public:
00068     shared_read_completion_type GetReadCompletionFunc(int fd) {
00069         auto iter = _read_func_map.find(fd);
00070         return iter == _read_func_map.end() ? shared_read_completion_type() : iter->second;
00071     }
00072 
00073     shared_write_completion_type GetWriteCompletionFunc(int fd) {
00074         auto iter = _write_func_map.find(fd);
00075         return iter == _write_func_map.end() ? shared_write_completion_type() : iter->second;
00076     }
00077     shared_raw_completion_type GetRawCompletionFunc(int fd) {
00078         auto iter = _raw_func_map.find(fd);
00079         return iter == _raw_func_map.end() ? shared_raw_completion_type() : iter->second;
00080     }
00081 
00082     shared_read_completion_type GetAndCreateReadCompletionFunc(int fd)  {
00083         auto& shared_completion = _read_func_map[fd];
00084         if (!shared_completion) shared_completion.reset(new shared_read_completion_type::element_type());
00085         return shared_completion;
00086     }
00087     shared_write_completion_type GetAndCreateWriteCompletionFunc(int fd) {
00088         auto& shared_completion = _write_func_map[fd];
00089         if (!shared_completion) shared_completion.reset(new shared_write_completion_type::element_type());
00090         return shared_completion;
00091     }
00092     shared_raw_completion_type GetAndCreateRawCompletionFunc(int fd) {
00093         auto& shared_completion = _raw_func_map[fd];
00094         if (!shared_completion) shared_completion.reset(new shared_raw_completion_type::element_type());
00095         return shared_completion;
00096     }
00097 
00098     void CancelReadCompletionFunc(int fd)  { _read_func_map.erase(fd); }
00099     void CancelWriteCompletionFunc(int fd) { _write_func_map.erase(fd); }
00100     void CancelRawCompletionFunc(int fd)   { _raw_func_map.erase(fd); }
00101 
00102     std::map<int,shared_read_completion_type> const& GetReadCompletionMap() const { return _read_func_map; }
00103     std::map<int,shared_write_completion_type> const& GetWriteCompletionMap() const { return _write_func_map; }
00104     std::map<int,shared_raw_completion_type> const& GetRawCompletionMap() const { return _raw_func_map; }
00105 
00106 private:
00107     std::map<int,shared_read_completion_type>  _read_func_map;
00108     std::map<int,shared_write_completion_type> _write_func_map;
00109     std::map<int,shared_raw_completion_type> _raw_func_map;
00110 };
00111 
00112 }  // end of namespace async
00113 }  // end of namespace asio
00114 }  // end of namespace lsf
00115 
00116 // vim:ts=4:sw=4:et:ft=cpp:
